name: City Bike Rider
description:
Did you miss biking in the city? Then this game is for you. City Bike Rider.

Fun Bicycle Rider simulation. Drive bicycles between car , truck in traffic.

GAME FEATURES
- Perfect & Realistic Bicycle Controls
- Realistic Traffic system
- 20 cool and addictive levels
- Big city maps (New York like enormous city)
- Amazing 3D graphics
- More than 15 language support
- More levels are coming soon.

Completely realistic traffic bicycles rider. Get a maximized experience with a real bicycles feeling on your device!


HOW TO PLAY
- Control your bike by using break and acceleration buttons.


TIPS
- You may choose how to control your Bike on the Settings menu.
- If you follow traffic rules during the game, you will earn more money.
- The faster you complete the mission, more money you will earn.


You can reach us for any questions or problems on help@zuuks.com
